 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁאַג‎</span> **verb** ==roar== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***low, bleat***, [[BDB#Frey|Frey]]); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשׁ‎</span> [[Isa.5.29|Isa 5:29]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] consecutive (&gt; [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁאַג‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁאָ֖ג‎</span> [[Amos.3.8|Amos 3:8]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁאַג‎</span> [[Amos.3.4|Amos 3:4]] +, etc.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁאֹג‎</span> [[Jer.25.30|Jer 25:30]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁאֵג‎</span> [[Judg.14.5|Judg 14:5]]; [[Ps.22.14|Ps 22:14]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺאֵג‎</span> [[Ezek.22.25|Ezek 22:25]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁאֲגִים‎</span> [[Zeph.3.3|Zeph 3:3]]; [[Ps.104.21|Ps 104:21]] — 

**1.** ***roar***, of lion [[Judg.14.5|Judg 14:5]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִקְרָאתוֺ‎</span>), [[Amos.3.4|Amos 3:4]]; [[Amos.3.8|Amos 3:8]]; [[Ps.104.21|Ps 104:21]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of prey), figurative of invaders and foes [[Jer.2.15|Jer 2:15]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person) [[Ps.22.14|Ps 22:14]], compare [[Ps.74.4|Ps 74:4]], simile [[Isa.5.29|Isa 5:29]]; [[Jer.51.38|Jer 51:38]] figurative of rapacious rulers [[Zeph.3.3|Zeph 3:3]]; [[Ezek.22.25|Ezek 22:25]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְשִׂיאֶיהָ‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְבִיאֶתהָ‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] and modern); of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> (like lion) calling scattered Israel [[Hos.11.10|Hos 11:10]] (twice in verse) (on text of see see [[BDB#Now|Now]]); of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> roaring in thunder [[Jer.25.30|Jer 25:30]]a = [[Amos.1.2|Amos 1:2]] = [[Joel.3.16|Joel 3:16]], also [[Jer.25.30|Jer 25:30]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁאֹג יִשְׁאַג‎</span>, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלנָֿוֵהוּ‎</span>); compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁאַגקֿוֺל‎</span> [[Job.37.4|Job 37:4]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַרְעֵם‎</span>). 

**2.** of human cry in distress [[Ps.38.9|Ps 38:9]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> causative).
